global_templates_page.main_title: Key features of Xynage - Digital Signage Solutions

key_feature.title: Wide Range of Media Support
key_feature.description: Xynage helps you to gather attention of more customers. It allows you to add wide range of media and content such as images, videos, twitter posts, and more all on a single screen.

key_feature.title: Effortless Menu Board Creation
key_feature.description: Create interactive and personalized content with simple drag and drop tool of the CMS. Also, you can offer a great customer experience by overlaying video over image or vice-versa.

key_feature.title: Central Management
key_feature.description: Decentralized content can be managed either via your own CMS or using our hassle-free Cloud Hosting. You can remotely control and manage the content with zero maintenance.

key_feature.title: Automatic Scheduling
key_feature.description: Flexible scheduling allows changes in content on daily, weekly and monthly basis automatically. Event based schedules are perfect for running new product, special event or festival campaigns.

key_feature.title: Offline Storage
key_feature.description: Xynage can display scheduled content without Internet. Content and schedule updates are pushed from local storages to the players automatically when Internet connection resumes.

key_feature.title: Simple Plug-and-Play Installation
key_feature.description: Xynage is a simple plug-and-play digital signage solution where all you need is a display device, an HDMI cable, and an internet connection.
